column4: setting up kmail, come password time i get the 'kwallet' not found error....i have the kwallet manager but apparently no wallet.... pointer to the solution ,  please.
does it matter that i am running ubuntu?
check your package manager to see if you have kwallet, try synaptic, if it has been installed, reinstall it. If it isnt installed, install it with synaptic, system>administration>synaptic
